arts.ttl: Napoli vs. Atalanta, 3 points to get back on track
arts.sum: The official head-to-head record between the two teams in Naples is 64 matches: 39 Napoli wins (the last 2-0 in Serie A 2022/23), 14 draws (the last 0-0 in Coppa Italia 2020/21) and 11 Atalanta victories (the last 3-0 in last year`s Serie A). Atalanta is the team with the most draws in Serie A 2025/26: 7 in 11 matchdays.
